description.en:
Vertcoin (VTC) is a cryptocurrency that was created in 2014 to make mining accessible and easy to everyone. It allows for GPU mining and gaming simultaneously. Even from your home computer.

Vertcoin is not funded nor controlled by any entity, it is simply an ASIC resistant P2P variant of Bitcoin that takes on the same maximum low coin supply as Litecoin (84,000,000).

description.ko:
중앙은행과 채굴 하드웨어 제조사들의 통제에서 벗어나기 위해 만들어진 코인입니다. 개개인의 고유한 은행을 소유하는 것을 목표로 중앙은행 및 거대 금융의 금리, 수수료 등에서 벗어나 개인간의 거래 활성화를 위해 개발되었으며 버트코인 채굴자들에게 쉬운 채굴과 공평한 기회를 제공하기 위해 개발됐습니다.

코인 특징
개인간 이체, 교환 시 이체 수수료는 모든 채굴자들과 비례해서 평등하게 나눠집니다. 채굴은 쉽고 공평해야 한다는 목표를 가지고 있으며 더 좋은 채굴기를 가진 채굴자에게 부의 편중이 쏠리는 것을 막기 위해 고안됐습니다. 모든 채굴자에게 똑같은 기회를 부여하여 평등하게 경쟁하며 채굴 실패로 인해 피해를 입는 사람이 없도록 개발된 것이 특징입니다. 모두에게 공평한 기회를 부여하기 위해 상장시에도 투자자에게 무상지급이나 저가공급 등이 없었습니다.

status_updates.description:
Check out this awesome article from CoinRivet 

https://coinrivet.com/community-owned-vertcoin-is-back-on-the-scene/

Taproot is activated!

As of block #1623304, Taproot has been activated on the Vertcoin blockchain!

If you solo mine, run a P2Pool node, or run a pool ensure to upgrade if you haven't already

https://github.com/vertcoin-project/vertcoin-core/releases/tag/0.18.0-rc1

Though it is a release candidate, the final version for release will be the same.

BLOCK 1623304: https://insight.vertcoin.org/block/1a5f9e350843a8918f3d3e92ed8f162b82f0409ea313a8c2adccafa43037c972

We are happy to announce we are now on the Changelly swap system. 

Go for a swap > https://changelly.com

Vertcoin is now listed on Changelly Pro

The following pairs are supported: 

VTC/BTC
https://pro.changelly.com/vtc-to-btc

VTC/BUSD
https://pro.changelly.com/vtc-to-busd

Not an endorsement; DYOR.

https://changelly.com/blog/changelly-pro-lists-vtc/

Taproot PR is merged and 0.18-rc1 is tagged
https://github.com/vertcoin-project/vertcoin-core/releases/tag/0.18.0-rc1

Here’s the finalized deployment timeline :
StartTime // July 1, 2021
Timeout // August 14, 2021
min_activation_height // Approximately September 1, 2021
We go live at 12:30 ET!  https://youtu.be/pq43JANx-_o

New #OneClickMiner release includes:

Removal of vertcoinpool 
Updated translations 
Update to Wails 1.16.3
Updated packages and optimized build script 
Added pinging logic to select nearest P2pool node 
Frontend dependency update 

https://github.com/vertcoin-project/one-click-miner-vnext/releases/tag/2.1-beta2

#Vertcoin #verthash #OCM
